title: Survival Melee Weapons
description: High Quality Collection of 12 Survival Melee Weapons and Tools
longDescription:
High Quality Collection of 12 Survival Melee Weapons or for use as Tools, perfect for First Person Combat.

Fits for various game genres such as Open World Survival, and such.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 12 High Quality Survival Melee Weapons and Tools
  • High Quality PBR Textures with resolution between 2048x2048 and 4096x4096 for each Weapon.
  • Includes the following Weapons / Tools : Baseball Bats, Climbing Axe, Hatchet, Forest Axe, Combat Knife, Hammer, Sickle, Machete, Crowbar, Rusty Pan, and a Shovel.

Props scaled to Epic skeleton: No

Texture Sizes (2048x2048-4096x4096)

Collision: Automatically Generated

Vertex Count: 4383 Total

LODs: No

Number of Meshes: 12

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 13

Number of Textures: 14 Base Color, 14 Normal, 14 OcclusionRoughnessMetallic

Supported Development Platforms: Tested for Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: No
